Title: Planning applications: called-in decisions and recovered appeals

Title: Building regulations: appeals
Text: Guidance about meeting the building regulations, given by decisions on appeals against refusals by local authorities to relax or dispense with one or more requirements of the regulations.

Title: Building regulations: determinations
Text: Guidance about meeting the building regulations, given by decisions on disputes made by the Secretary of State for Communities and Local Government.

Title: Planning officer guidance
